Sentencas: A self-developed simulation platform of natural gas internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (IRSOFC)-gas turbine (GT) hybrid generation system was described in this paper.
Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Sentencas: It fully reflected the concept of multi-level and hierarchical modeling.
Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Sentencas: For SOFC, there are the general electrochemical model including both H-2 and CO oxidation, the advanced electrochemical model considering surface diffusion and competition absorption, the mechanistic transport model and its approximate analytical solution.
Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Sentencas: With a set of uniform governing equations for both planar and tubular SOFCs, description of flow and heat transfer in cell-level models provides the boundary conditions for the different types of electrode-level models.
Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Sentencas: And the models with different complexity of other balancing components were also developed for different system requirements.
Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Titulo: Multi-level simulation platform of SOFC-GT hybrid generation system

Sentencas: By comparison with the experimental data of the Siemens-Westinghouse 220 kW demonstration SOFC-GT hybrid generation system, our model library was validated with better performance than the advanced power system analysis tool (APSAT).
